scripts.start: cp src/image/star_gray.png dist/ | cp src/image/star_yellow.png dist/ | cp src/css/style.css dist/ | cp src/index.html dist | webpack -p
scripts.dev: cp src/image/star_gray.png dist/ | cp src/image/star_yellow.png dist/ | cp src/css/style.css dist/ | cp src/index.html dist/ | webpack -d --watch
scripts.build: cp src/image/star_gray.png dist/ | cp src/image/star_yellow.png dist/ | cp src/css/style.css dist/ | cp src/index.html dist | webpack -p
